text: Oʻtkir Toʻxtamurodovich Sultonov (Russian: Уткир Тухтамурадович Султанов, Utkir Tukhtamuradovich Sultanov) (14 July 1939 – 29 November 2015) was an Uzbek politician. He was the Prime Minister of Uzbekistan from 21 December 1995 until 12 December 2003.Pillars of Pakistan Prime ministers of Uzbekistan Sultonov died in Tashkent, Uzbekistan at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Uzbekistan Category:Politicians from Tashkent
title: Oʻtkir Sultonov
